tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE healthcare_providers (
    provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    provider_name VARCHAR(255),
    provider_type VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    contact_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE provider_information (
    provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    provider_name VARCHAR(255),
    provider_specialty VARCHAR(255),
    provider_location VARCHAR(255),
    provider_contact VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE billing_details (
    billing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    provider_id INT,
    patient_id INT,
    service_date DATE,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES provider_information(provider_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Claims (
    claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    provider_id INT,
    claim_date DATE,
    claim_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  patient_dob DATE,
  patient_gender TEXT,
  patient_insurance_id TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE medical_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  provider_id INT,
  appointment_date DATE,
  diagnosis TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE HealthcareProviders (
  provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  provider_name VARCHAR,
  specialty VARCHAR,
  address VARCHAR,
  phone_number VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR,
  date_of_birth DATE,
  gender VARCHAR,
  address VARCHAR,
  phone_number VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE Appointments (
  appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  provider_id INT,
  appointment_date DATE,
  appointment_time TIME
)

CREATE TABLE Billing (
  bill_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  provider_id INT,
  bill_amount DECIMAL,
  payment_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE InsuranceCompanies (
  insurance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name VARCHAR,
  company_address VARCHAR,
  company_phone VARCHAR,
  contact_person VARCHAR
)
